# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Truecolor_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Truecolor)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
TruecolorPluginInfo.C
TruecolorCommonPluginInfo.C
TruecolorAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
TruecolorPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
TruecolorGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisTruecolorPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
TruecolorViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
TruecolorViewerPluginInfo.C
avtTruecolorPlot.C
avtTruecolorFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
TruecolorViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
TruecolorEnginePluginInfo.C
avtTruecolorPlot.C
avtTruecolorFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ITruecolorPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ITruecolorPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ITruecolorPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GTruecolorPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    set_target_properties(GTruecolorPlot PROPERTIES AUTOMOC ON)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GTruecolorPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VTruecolorPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VTruecolorPlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VTruecolorPlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GTruecolorPlot VTruecolorPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            TruecolorScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyTruecolorAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(STruecolorPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(STruecolorPlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(STruecolorPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} STruecolorPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY TruecolorAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaTruecolor ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} TruecolorAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ETruecolorPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ETruecolorPlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ETruecolorPlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ETruecolorPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ETruecolorPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ETruecolorPlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ETruecolorPlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ETruecolorPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots Truecolor ${INSTALLTARGETS})
